dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1211 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 400 N. Main Street, Encinal, Texas, as the “Encinal Veterans Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cuellar introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 400 N. Main Street, Encinal, Texas, as the Encinal Veterans Post Office.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 400 N. Main Street, Encinal, Texas, shall be known and designated as the Encinal Veterans Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Encinal Veterans Post Office.
